alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Charles and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Norco, or 9 miles east of Laplace, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Metairie, Laplace, Jefferson, Harahan, Elmwood, Luling, River Ridge, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, New Sarpy, St. Rose, Norco, Bridge City and New Orleans Armstrong Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 212 and 231. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
